VujtlraMls.cJe> '\\JuJLno u tc. fhsJ>U£&^>i The illustrations were done by Womble, aka Dave T, who apart from being probably the world's only rock n'roll dentist is the publisher of an excellent magazine called WAKE UP, combining liard-hitting political satire, excellently informative and well-researched articles, band interviews and loads more cartoons like these! Issue 9 £2 inc p/p: issue 10 £3 inc p&p from Womble, 112 Victoria Road, Oulton Broad, Lowestoft, Suffolk NR33 9LU. If you want to write to me you can do so c/o Bloodaxe, PO Box 1SN, Newcastle-upon-Tyne NE991SN.
